Other Projects

Outside of professional activities, I do some stuff for fun.

Writing

I am a contributor to the Broad Street Review, a non-profit online arts and culture publication for the greater Philadelphia area. You can read my work here.

Twitter Bots

I manage some Twitter bots.

  • @UMass_Horoscope: A spreadsheet-powered Twitter bot to share the @MDCollegian horoscopes. Built by @zachwhalen, modified by @storybench, implemented by @sheishistoric.
  • @onlylistentoTMG: I only listen to @mountain_goats – can recommend any song for any mood. source code
  • @tmgdnd: A bot that mashes @mountain_goats lyrics with situations from Dungeons & Dragons. source code
  • @faketmglyrics: a Markov chain bot for @mountain_goats lyrics. source code

I’ve written about my interest in making Twitter bots and my love for the Mountain Goats here.
